Package de.teklic.mario.io.input

Class SerialPortInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.teklic.mario.io.input.SerialPortInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, purejavacomm.SerialPortEventListener
    public class SerialPortInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements purejavacomm.SerialPortEventListener, java.lang.Runnable
    SerialPortInput-Singleton A input source, which deliveres new content, which the LoRa-Module received.

        public void run()
        Runs the SerialPortInput in a Thread and constantly reads new received data. Notifies the JLora instance, if there are new data available.
